TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskCompletionSource`1<TResult> extends System.Object
generic <typename TResult> public ref class TaskCompletionSource

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 與這個 相關聯之結果值的類型。

span.span: The type of the result value assocatied with this .

summary.span: 代表未與委派繫結之 的生產者端，可提供透過 屬性對消費者端的存取。

span.span: Represents the producer side of a unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在許多案例中，就很有用，若要啟用來代表外部的非同步作業。In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a to represent an external asynchronous operation. 針對此目的所提供。 is provided for this purpose. 它讓您建立的工作，可以分配給取用者，以及這些取用者可以使用工作的成員，就像任何其他。It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers, and those consumers can use the members of the task as they would any other. 不過，不同於大部分的工作，建立由 TaskCompletionSource 工作的狀態受到明確 TaskCompletionSource 上的方法。However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource. 這可讓外部的非同步作業，以傳播到基礎工作完成。This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task. 區隔也可確保取用者不能轉換對應 TaskCompletionSource 對沒有存取權狀態。The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[TaskCompletionSource 本質\](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx)中平行程式設計.NET 部落格。For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. [平行擴充功能範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717)也包含使用方式的範例。The [Parallel Extensions samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用:The following example shows how to use a : [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/cs/taskcompletionsource.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/vb/taskcompletionsource.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有成員是安全執行緒，且可能在從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: All members of are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓取用者存取由這個執行個體。This property enables a consumer to access the that is controlled by this instance. 當您建立物件屬性這物件會傳回 When you create a object, the property of this object returns ， ， ，和方法 （和與其"Try"的變數） 在此執行個體上相關的狀態轉換中的所有結果基礎工作。The , , , and methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.

summary.span: 嘗試將基礎 轉換為 狀態。

span.span: Attempts to transition the underlying into the state.

returns.span: 如果作業成功則為 true，如果作業未成功或物件已處置則為 false。

span.span: True if the operation was successful; false if the operation was unsuccessful or the object has already been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業會傳回 false 如果已在三種最終狀態的其中一個： ， ，或。This operation will return false if the is already in one of the three final states: , , or . 這個方法也會傳回 false 如果基礎已經過處置。This method also returns false if the underlying has already been disposed.
